verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh Spirit of God, take my heart and take my soul –
I give them to You, take control, take control
Oh Spirit of God, take my heart and take my soul –
I give them to You, take control, take control

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When I find my soul is weak and I can’t find the words to speak
Jesus would You let Your love fall?
So I offer this simple prayer – for Lord I know You are always there
I’m carried by Your Holy Sp – ir - it

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When I can’t pray and I can’t stand, Spirit take me by the hand
So I can walk through this valley of death
Though I am gone and I am lost – You died for me, Jesus You paid the cost!
Come and bring me back to life again!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
So let Your love come fall upon us, come let Your love invade
For You came as one among us and now the price is paid (repeat)
